

== Examples ==


| Operating System (OS) | Command                     |
|-----------------------|-----------------------------|
| Windows               | C:\>yarn install mysoftware |
| Mac OS                | >yarn install mysoftware    |
| Linux                 | >yarn install mysoftware    |


# Basic Windows commands


| Command     | Description                   |
|-------------|-------------------------------|
| dir         | List the directory            |
| cd pathname | Change dir                    |
| cd ..       | move one level up             |
| move        | move a file to another folder |
| cls         | clears the CLI window         |
| exit        | closes the CLI window         |
